events.comment: TODO: Make intro with our splash screens (and possibly begin loading stuff in background)
Extensions are only exported when present in a scene
so far we can now switch between rooms by walking up to the door of a house and hitting return key.
i have created two houses which lead to the same room due to lack of another room(anyone can create rooms in the rooms scene at a different area on the scene).

events.name: To Remove: Tests for teleporting to room

events.comment: Put the player at the right position when room loaded
This scene only exists for the purpose of including extensions, as Instructions in extensions are only exported when used in a scene
the event above can be deleted and added in the first scene when most scenes can switch across scenes.
events above can also be used to activate fullscreen for now till we get a working settings menu.

eventsFunctions.description: Teleports the player to a room
eventsFunctions.name: goToRoom
registerRoom
eventsFunctions.sentence: Register room _PARAM1_ with X = _PARAM2_ and Y = _PARAM3_

parameters.description: The X coordinate of the room entry point
parameters.name: x

parameters.description: The Y coordinate of the room entry point
parameters.name: y

eventsFunctions.description: Loads a scene in the background
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load a scene in the background
eventsFunctions.name: loadBGScene
eventsFunctions.sentence: Load the scene _PARAM1_ in the background

parameters.description: Name of the scene to load
parameters.name: sceneName

eventsFunctions.description: Pasues the current scene and switches to a background loaded scene.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Pause scene and go to background scene
eventsFunctions.name: switchToBGScene
eventsFunctions.sentence: Pause current scene and go to background scene _PARAM1_

parameters.description: Background Scene name to switch to
parameters.name: sceneName

eventsFunctions.description: Brings the current Scene back in background and switch back to the previous scene
eventsFunctions.name: switchBack
